# Notification.Name

**Type Alias**

An alias for a type used to represent the name of a notification.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Name = NSNotification.Name
```

## Creating a Notification

- **init(name:object:userInfo:)**: Initializes a new notification.
- **NSNotification.Name**: A structure that defines the name of a notification.

items.description: A structure that defines the name of a notification.
items.name: NSNotification.Name
